title: Curried chickpea salad
ingredients: ['150g bag of crispy lettuce leaves', '1 large avocado', '1 tsp lemon juice', '300g halved cherry tomatoes', '5cm piece of cucumber', '1 red onion', '1 1/2 tbsp olive oil', '1/2 tsp ground cumin', '1 tsp ground coriander', 'pinch of ground turmeric', '400g can chickpeas', '2 tsp lemon juice', '2 tsp mint sauce', '150ml plain yoghurt']
